function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High contact services operating during a total lockdown ","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small family-run businesses without resources to develop online presence","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High degree of physical interaction required for service delivery","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in transitioning services online","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close physical interaction between service providers and customers","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High degree of interactivity in service delivery","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online service delivery with no physical interaction","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proactive signals are costly, leading some firms to choose not to adopt an accommodative posture.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Social construction of hurricanes as acts of nature may limit proactive disease mitigation efforts","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective response to natural disasters due to lack of resilience","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission through close contact","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in dense urban areas due to increased customer footfall in pickup locations","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of contagion in restaurants due to high customer turnover and close proximity","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential contamination and transmission of diseases through food delivery and pickup services","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation due to crowded indoor environments such as casinos","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease transmission in the built environment due to social interactions and legitimacy-seeking activities","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studies under the functionalist school focused on rational efforts of managers to maximize efficiency through the coordination and control of work activities.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shift toward studying contingency variables such as environmental uncertainty, and determining their effect on structure.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Bounded rationality studies suggesting that managers are boundedly rational, and decision making entails a satisficing rather than an optimizing approach.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Close physical interaction in service industries increases the risk of contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged discussions with doctors","category":"Healthcare System","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing artificial intelligence and image processing technology for medical diagnosis","category":"Healthcare System","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on external networks for technical knowledge","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Food safety concerns and business model challenges","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of focus on digitalization-related changes","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of contagion in a closed fitness studio environment","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited capability to continue operations online","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of burger ingredients during delivery and handling","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid development of software without thorough testing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent travel to different cities for real estate tours","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Offering distant x-ray processing software for medical diagnosis","category":"Healthcare System","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse effects of internal processes and complex structures on the deployment of co-creation capabilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective deployment of co-creation capabilities leading to lack of deep relationships with customers","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate co-creation capabilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruptions caused by inadequate co-creation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of flexibility in highly efficient companies due to focus on increasing efficiency","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate resource fluidity and reconfiguring capabilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Organizations lacking the ability to sense and respond to new opportunities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to transform organizational assets to sustain flexibility and growth","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing new technologies without considering the realistic and beneficial aspects","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate integration between online and brick-and-mortar retailing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards more online shopping leading to greater reliance on delivery and logistics networks","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving a seamless omnichannel shopping experience","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical store crowding and safety management","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sensory appeals and social presence for online retailers","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of digital solutions in traditional retailing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neutralization of physical retailers’ characteristic strengths due to pandemic measures","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High cost of implementing complex technologies for social interaction and sensory input in online shops","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The potential spread of contagious diseases through touch-based interfaces and remote human interaction technologies","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"}]}
